name: Roomba Rumble
description:
Roomba Rumble has two players controlling opposing Roombas as they attempt to Recycle a crumbling building into one of their own. By Collecting bricks that are the same color of your Roomba, you inch that much closer to restoring your tower. (Green can be scored by either)

Originally Created for Global Game Jam 2020

Made By: Kevin Burns, Brayden Taylor, Murshed Choudhury, Dylan Rantoul
